sentences.en: During the 1920's and 1930's he wrote seventy - one Cantos, brilliant word pictures often devoid of meaning.
sentences.cn: 在二十和三十年代,他写出 七十一 篇《诗章》, 虽然语言鲜明如画,但往往缺乏任何明显的意义.

sentences.en: He is completely devoid of humour.
His face was devoid of any warmth or humour.
sentences.cn: 他的脸冷若冰霜，没有一丝幽默的表情。

sentences.en: His lips devoid of their ferocious sneer, were sealed in an expression of unspeakable sadness.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴唇失去了那凶恶的讥嘲神情, 却被一种难以名状的悲哀的表情封住了.

sentences.en: I have never looked on a face that was so devoid of feeling.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过这样一张完全没有感情的脸。

sentences.en: It is a situation, in sum, devoid of logic.
It makes me sick to read over such stereotypes devoid of content.
sentences.cn: 这种空洞无物的八股调,我看了就讨厌.

sentences.en: Love is never quite devoid of sentimentality.
sentences.cn: 爱情从来免不了多愁善感.

sentences.en: Not devoid of sympathy, the policeman's face also expressed a fatigued skepticism.
sentences.cn: 这位警察的脸上虽然不乏同情, 但也露出一种不胜其烦的怀疑表情.

sentences.en: Rice cakes may seem like a good option – after all they're fat-free and low in calories – but they're also devoid of fibre and protein and can make you crave something more satisfying.
sentences.cn: 大米蛋糕似乎是好的选择-毕竟它们无脂肪，低卡路里-但是它们也缺乏纤维和蛋白质，会使你渴望更令人满意的东西。

sentences.en: The answer was quick and sharp, devoid of humour.
sentences.cn: 回答迅捷而尖锐, 干巴巴的,毫无幽默感.

sentences.en: The arachnoid is composed of connective tissue devoid of blood vessels.
sentences.cn: 蛛网膜是由无血管的结缔组织所构成.

sentences.en: The articles are long - winded and devoid of substance.
The letter was devoid of warmth and feeling.
sentences.cn: 这封信既无热情又无感情。

sentences.en: The man's voice was devoid of inflection.
sentences.cn: 那人的声音缺少抑扬变化。

sentences.en: The report was devoid of facts.
They always pick the most intellectually devoid movie on the racks.
sentences.cn: 他们永远都只租架子上那些弱智片.

sentences.en: We humans appear to be meaning-seeking creatures that have the misfortune to be thrown into a world devoid of intrinsic meaning.
sentences.cn: 我们人类似乎是寻求意义的生物，而很不幸，我们却进入了一个本质上缺乏意义的世界。

sentences.en: Yet she is not devoid of humour and high spirits.
sentences.cn: 可是她并不缺少幽默和兴致.

trans.tran_en: If you say that someone or something is devoid of a quality or thing, you are emphasizing that they have none of it
